feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 3:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: SSE 25 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
